'''"In Drink's Clarity"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "In Drink's Clarity" is obtainable from [[Menakeri's Treasure Shop]] for 10 [[Dendro Sigil]].

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 14h
|White Iron Chunk = 4
|Red Dye = 2
|Blue Dye = 2

}}
